entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming north 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning and late in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 8.
